properties.areaDesc: Waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA extending from 20 nm to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 4:09AM EST until January 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 knots with gusts up to 25 knots.
Seas 3 to 4 feet.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From noon today to 1 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY
